channel.title: @!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!~Moving the compass~@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!
channel.description:
How do I move the compass in my server? Right now its slightly more to the right and I want to move it over to the left so I can add hitpoint, prayer, energy, and summoning orbs. I can't do that now because there is not enough room.
Here is a picture explaining.
[img]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh98/frakismyname/CompassMove.png?t=1288649232[/img]
Thanks.

item.title: @!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!~Moving the compass~@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

Rip the map frame sprite and compass from a client source that already has it and repack the cache with Tom’ s Cache Suite. Make sure that all the numbers correpsond with the source you ripped it from.

Read full topic

item.title: @!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!~Moving the compass~@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!@!
item.dc:creator: @Cancel Cancel
item.description:
@Cancel wrote:

i would guess that you would need a whole new compass, just replace the compass sprite with the one you showed that had the hp and sum. points, and it should work.

Read full topic
